item.description: Start with the story of the Thanksgiving Turkey [[permanent/The Parable of the Thanksgiving Turkey|The Parable of the Thanksgiving Turkey]] Establish credibility for stating your background Worked in tech for 13 years, small, medium and large companies Although what I am going to say is based on the tech world, I believe it is broad enough even if you are not in tech.

item.title: four thousand weeks book discussion
item.description: What is the book about? Our time on this earth is limited to four thousand weeks, but our commitments, goals and desires far outstretch what is achievable in this short span of time.

item.title: Git for RFIC Engineers
item.description: I need to rethink this in the context of RF / IC engineering. It is much more applicable to rfic.
